frontmatter.title: Using Instana to monitor integration deployment 300-level live demo
frontmatter.description: Using Instana to monitor integration deployment 300-level live demo

internal.content:
--- title: Using Instana to monitor integration deployment 300-level live demo description: Using Instana to monitor integration deployment 300-level live demo tabs: [ 'Demo preparation', 'Demo script'] --- export const Title = () => (

Using Instana to monitor integration deployment
300-level live demo

 ); ![banner](./images/banner to come.jpg) | DEMO OVERVIEW | | | :--- | :--- | | **Scenario overview** | TBD | | **Demo products** | TBD | | **Demo capabilities** | Dependency mapping; Intelligent alerting; Distributed tracing | | **Sales guidance** | Download the sales guidance document here. | | **Demo intro slides** | Download the Introduction and Overview slides here. This is a short deck of customer-facing slides that sets the context for the demo. | | **Demo script** | A complete demo script is on the second tab above. You can download a printer-ready PDF of the demo script here.

This demo script has multiple tasks, that each have multiple steps. In each step, you have the details about what you need to do (**Actions**), what you can say while delivering this demo step (**Narration**), and what diagrams and screenshots you will see.

This demo script is a suggestion, and you are welcome to customize based on your sales opportunity. Most importantly, practice this demo in advance. If the demo seems easy for you to execute, the customer will focus on the content. If it seems difficult for you to execute, the customer will focus on your delivery. | | **Demo guidance** | The demo environment is set to automatically inject an error into the application once every hour.

The cycle begins at ten minutes to the hour (so 9:50, 10:50, etc). You should see errors begin to show up a few minutes after this (around 52 or 53 minutes past the hour), with the errors lasting 15 minutes. | | **Customer-ready
demo video** | View the demo video here. This is a short, but detailed, hands-on walkthrough of the scenario. The video is customer-ready.

Potential uses of this video are:

1. Familiarize yourself with the details of this scenario
2. Gain customer agreement that they would like to have a tech-seller do a deep-dive demo of this scenario
3. Use as a prospecting tool to generate customer interest in these capabilities | | **Customer-facing
expert guidance** | Observability is the new APM for cloud-native applications. | | **Required versions** | Instana 3.213 | | **How to get support** | **For IBMers:**
• Contact #itz-techzone-support or techzone.help@ibm.com regarding issues with reserving and provisioning Tech Zone environments.
• Contact #platinumdemos-automation-support regarding issues with setting up and running this demo.

**For Business Partners:**
• Contact Tech Zone Support regarding issues with reserving and provisioning Tech Zone environments.
• Contact Automation Platinum Demos Support regarding issues with setting up and running this demo. | ### **PREPARE TO GIVE THE DEMO** Business partners will need to request access to the environment. See 2 - Business partners requisition instructions below. Allow up to two business days to receive access.
1 - Environment setup
Log in to the demo environment:
• For IBMers, click here.
• For business partners, click here.
Since you will be demonstrating using a past incident, you will need to set the time period.
1. In the upper right, click the button showing the timeframe.


2. At the bottom of the pop-up, set the timeframe to begin at 15 minutes past the hour and end at 45 minutes past the hour (1). It doesn’t matter which hour you pick. Click **Set Time** (2).

This will ensure you see normal behavior for the application. During the demo you will change the time window to observe a failure occurring.
**[Go to top](#top)**
2 - Business partners requisition instructions
To request access to the demo environment, email Tim Burke. The turnaround time for requests is two business days.
**[Go to top](#top)**
*** Click [here](/300-observing-your-integration-estate-with-instana/demo-script) to go to the **Demo script** on the next tab.
